plot: A police officer goes undercover to catch a wealthy and reputable person, who is involved in criminal activities. "Ja re ja o harjai, dekhi teri dildari..." is hummable.
title: Kalicharan
plot_es: A police officer goes undercover to catch a wealthy and reputable person, who is involved in criminal activities. "Ja re ja o harjai, dekhi teri dildari..." is hummable.
plot_en: A police officer goes undercover to catch a wealthy and reputable person, who is involved in criminal activities. "Ja re ja o harjai, dekhi teri dildari..." is hummable.
